title: About Us
description:
ZANELLA Lounge is an elevated social space in Cluj-Napoca.
High Quality Food & Drinks.
Curated Music & Ambiance.
Weekly Themed Events.
Great Service.
Dress Code: Smart Casual.
(No sportswear, or overly casual attire)
